channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 00:24 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 00:24 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 00:22 The alarm was sounded in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 00:22 The alarm was sounded in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - m. item.title: 🔴 21:58 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 🔴 21:58 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
